translation.CoinGecko's API limit has been reached: CoinGecko's API limit has been reached. The historical data that has been retrieved so far has been saved, and we'll continue retrieving data in {{countdown}} seconds.
translation.Please select different exchanges: Please select different exchanges or wallets for your transfer
translation.UploadFieldText: Click or drag file(s) to this upload area
translation.UploadFieldHint: Supports Coineda, Binance (Spot Order History), Kraken CSV exports, Cointracking CSV exports
translation.Transactions partially uploaded: {{inserts}} transactions successfully imported. {{duplicates}} were duplicates. {{errors}} errors
translation.Select an exchange or a wallet: Select an exchange or a wallet
Unable to fetch exchanges from database. Please try again or open a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/fabianbormann/Coineda/issues/new
translation.The Binance API does currently not allow: The Binance API does currently not allow client side requests.
translation.We are planning to provide a workaround: We are planning to provide a workaround in the future.
translation.1. Log into your Binance account, and cl: 1. Log into your Binance account, and click
translation.2. Enter a label/name for your API key (: 2. Enter a label/name for your API key (e.g. CoinedaApiKey) and click [Create API].
translation.3. You only need to check \"Enable Readi: 3. You only need to check "Enable Reading" within the "API restrictions" section
translation.4. Complete the security verification wi: 4. Complete the security verification with your registered 2FA devices.
translation.How to get an API key?: How to get an API key?
translation.Asset becomes tax free: {{value}} {{symbol}} become tax free in {{days}} days. The current gain is about {{gain}}
translation.Selled asset summary: Selled {{value}} {{symbol}} on {{date}} for {{fiat}}. You were holding the currency for {{days}} days, therefore you have realized {{gains}}.
translation.Asset Explanation: Not all assets were added by default because the selection menu would be overloaded with the number of available tokens. However, you can easily search and add missing assets.
translation.The account name cannot be empty: The account name cannot be empty
translation.Failed to delete the account. Please try: Failed to delete the account. Please try again or open a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/fabianbormann/Coineda/issues/new
translation.The account name you have chosen is alre: The account name you have chosen is already in use. Please choose a different name and try again
translation.Failed to save the account: Failed to save the account. Please reloading the application and try it again. If the problem persists, please open an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/fabianbormann/Coineda/issues/new
translation.Failed to update the account: Failed to update the account. Please reloading the application and try it again. If the problem persists, please open an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/fabianbormann/Coineda/issues/new
translation.Are you sure to delete this account?: Are you sure to delete this account?
translation.The last account is protected and cannot: The last account is protected and cannot be removed
translation.Disclaimer Text: Coineda does not provide tax, legal or accounting advices. The provided dashboard and rudimentary tax calculations may contain errors, are incorrect for your country or doesn't cover all tax relevant regulations. Those calculations are developed to the best of my knowledge but I'm not a tax expert and I do not take any responsibility for incorrect calculations.
translation.If you find any bug open a: If you find any bug please open a
